lead_paragraph: More than 10,000 Indians have recently lost their jobs in Saudi Arabia, and many are stranded there after a steep drop in the price of oil.

byline.contributor: Ben Hubbard contributed reporting from Beirut, Lebanon.

headline.print_headline: India Helps Jobless Workers Struggling in Saudi Arabia
headline.main: Thousands of Indian Workers Are Stuck in Saudi Arabia as Kingdom’s Economy Sags

snippet: More than 10,000 Indians have recently lost their jobs in Saudi Arabia, and many are stranded there after a steep drop in the price of oil....
abstract: Indian government is struggling to support citizens who have lost their jobs in Saudi Arabia as result of drop in global oil prices; there are more than three million Indian workers in kingdom, and many have seen no wages in months and are struggling to find food and shelter.
